    evariation_on f (s ∩ Icc a b) + evariation_on f (s ∩ Icc b c) = evariation_on f (s ∩ Icc a c) :=
  by
  have A : IsGreatest (s ∩ Icc a b) b := ⟨⟨hb, hab, le_rfl⟩, (inter_subset_right _ _).trans Icc_subset_Iic_self⟩
  have B : IsLeast (s ∩ Icc b c) b := ⟨⟨hb, le_rfl, hbc⟩, (inter_subset_right _ _).trans Icc_subset_Ici_self⟩
  rw [← evariation_on.union f A B, ← inter_union_distrib_left, Icc_union_Icc_eq_Icc hab hbc]
#align Icc_add_Icc Icc_add_Icc
